items.title: CHRISTMAS IN CYCLADES
items.description: Christmas in the Cyclades remains unchanged over time and reflects old habits that modern times have not managed to eradicate. ...
items.excerpt: Christmas in the Cyclades remains unchanged over time and reflects old habits that modern times have not managed to eradicate. ...

items.title: THE NEW YEAR’S CAROLS IN OIA
items.description: New Year's carols were not invented by young children but by groups of men, mostly young, accompanied by violins at New Year's Eve. ...

items.title: EPIPHANY IN GREECE
items.description: Epiphany is a great annual Christian celebration of the Baptism of Jesus Christ on the Jordan River by St. John the Baptist. ...

items.title: EARLY BIRD BOOKINGS
items.description: Holidays in Greece are always something that needs planning. And now with Summer and Autumn over and as Winter is in full mode, early bookings for next season are in order. Now is the ideal time to be looking at this year’s summer holiday, especially for travellers who have...

items.title: VALENTINE’S DAY IN SANTORINI
items.description: As Valentine's Day draws to a close, publications about the most romantic places in the world are growing. Although we are in winter, Santorini remains very high in preferences. ...

items.title: THE CUSTOM OF CIKNOPEMPTI
items.description: The second Thursday of the Triodion, the Creatine. (period of Carnival) is called Ciknopempti ( Cikna = the smell of burning meat and Pempti = Thursday), because on this day all the houses roast meat or melt the fat from the pork and the 'Cikna' is widespread all over the...
items.excerpt: The second Thursday of the Triodion, the Creatine. (period of Carnival) is called Ciknopempti ( Cikna = the smell of burning meat and Pempti = Thursday), because on this day all the houses roast meat or melt the fat from the pork and the 'Cikna' is widespread all over the...

items.title: DID YOU KNOW THERE IS A 2,500-YEAR-OLD “SECRET” CARNIVAL?
items.description: Every year, the Dionysian Carnival of Naxos makes a dreamy journey past, animating the ancient Greek myths in the most frantic way....
